UK, 97% are healthy and 1% 
of babies will be born with 
conditions that can be partly 
or completely corrected, 
such	as	extra	fingers	or	toes.	
About	2%,	however,	will	suffer	
from more serious conditions. 
Regular antenatal care and 
careful observation during 
labour helps to pick up any 
potential problems and allow 
appropriate action to be 
taken.
If you are particularly 
concerned	–	perhaps	because	
you or someone in your family 
has	a	disability	–	talk	to	your	
midwife or
